title: Mobile-Based Extended Learning Design for Social Science MOOCs

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and understanding of elementary-level social studies subjects
context.additional_context: Large-scale social studies-integrated microlearning program operating in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, requiring time-efficient learning design for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% understanding of foundational social studies concepts through 5-minute microlearning modules.
Learners submit peer-evaluated project assignments at a 100% rate using mobile collaboration tools.
Learners engage in at least three interactions (comments/sharing) during weekly learning community activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
